overview: Information stimulation begets ignorance, false morality. Inspired by Western culture's demise & Baruch Goldstein's Purim 1993 massacre of Palestinian Mosque-goers. Elitism and laxation among the living are tuned to "Metahua" by Jossy, a song about a guy coming over to his girlfriend's house. Bursting towards your reality.  Dedicated to the fallen West and to the memory of Yitzhak Rabin.
title: Caring High
